content.title: Elden Ring
content.text: Embark on a grand journey across the mystical Lands Between in this epic fantasy action-RPG by FromSoftware. Discover a vast world full of complex characters, lore, and intense combat.

content.title: Bloodborne
content.text: Explore the gothic city of Yharnam, whose denizens are afflicted with a blood-borne disease. This action RPG challenges players with its intricate mystery and unforgiving combat.

content.title: Dark Souls 3
content.text: Confront the brutal and beautiful world of Lothric in this critically acclaimed dark fantasy RPG. Battle formidable foes and unravel the deep lore behind the fading fire.

content.title: Sekiro
content.text: Step into the shoes of the 'one-armed wolf,' a disgraced and disfigured warrior rescued from the brink of death. Master the art of stealth, explore late 1500s Sengoku Japan, and exact revenge against your nemesis.

content.title: Demon's Souls
content.text: Navigate the treacherous realms of Boletaria in a remake of the genre-defining game that blends unforgiving combat with unique online interactions. Prepare to face nightmarish creatures in a world filled with despair.
